scripts.start: tmux send-keys -t $npm_package_name:0.0 'npm run dev' C-m && tmux send-keys -t $npm_package_name:0.1 'npm run fire-emulators' C-m
scripts.poststart:
clear && echo "$(tput bold)$(tput setab 7)$(tput setaf 0) -=- Your TMUX session '$npm_package_name' was started -=- $(tput sgr0)
$(tput setab 7)$(tput setaf 4)  Attach with $(tput bold)npm run tmux  $(tput sgr0)$(tput setab 7)$(tput setaf 0) :: $(tput setab 7)$(tput setaf 1)  Detach with $(tput bold)Ctrl^B D    $(tput sgr0)
$(tput setab 7)$(tput setaf 2)$(tput bold)  • SvelteKit dev server $(tput sgr0)$(tput setab 7)$(tput setaf 2)> $(tput smul)http://localhost:5173$(tput rmul)          $(tput sgr0)
$(tput setab 7)$(tput setaf 5)$(tput bold)  • Firestore emulator $(tput sgr0)$(tput setab 7)$(tput setaf 5)> $(tput smul)http://localhost:34738/firestore$(tput rmul) $(tput sgr0)"
